name: Comfort (Thirdhand)
description:
Comfort is a game about the necessity of making irreversible choices and the fact that we will never know what we miss by choosing one path over another.

Made with Unity3D, using the following free assets:

3D Toys, Garden Realistic Tools, Medieval Tavern Pack, Mega Fantasy Props Pack, Nature Starter Kit 2, Dark Fantasy Kit [FREE], and yes, the accursed Unity Standard Assets. Thanks to all you guys!
